sentence.Network_en: The three Comoros islands are about 300 km ( 190 miles ) northwest of Madagascar in the Mozambique channel.
sentence.Network_cn: 这三个科摩罗群岛约300公里 ( 190英里 ) 西北马达加斯加莫桑比克海峡.

sentence.Network_en: There does not seem to Madagascar, Mauritius, Comoros, Seychelles, Cape Verde, these are island nations.
sentence.Network_cn: 那就没有马达加斯加, 毛里求斯, 科摩罗, 塞舌尔, 佛得角了, 这些都是岛国.

sentence.Network_en: Again in 1987 this fish was filmed by a submersible at the Comoros Islands.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来在1987年一个潜水者在科摩罗群岛拍摄到了腔棘鱼.

Sentence.sentence: When planes fall from the sky, as a Yemeni airliner did on its way to Comoros Islands in the India ocean June 30, 2009, the black box is the best bet for identifying what went wrong.
